content: The remaining increase reflects the expanded size and scope of the company since the first quarter of 2021, including an increase of $4.4 million in advertising, marketing promotion cost as the company continues to invest in building market awareness of motive and an increase of $5.2 million in compensation cost, which reflects the increase in headcount over the past year as the company has grown internally and through the acquisition of AdRizer, as well as the consolidation of the compensation cost of the Lomotif since July of 2021.
